sqlUnit.name: page_model_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,t.uri,t.view_uri,(select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.state and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='DATA_STATE')) as state,u.full_name,t.create_time from t_flow_page_model t,t_n_user u where u.id=t.user_id order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: select_page_model_item
sqlUnit.sql: select t.uri,t.name from t_flow_page_model t where t.state = '1'

sqlUnit.name: flow_process_list
sqlUnit.sql: select p.id,p.name,p.display_name, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=org_pro.flow_type and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='FLOW_TYPE')) as type ,o.seq_names as orgName, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=p.state and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='DATA_STATE')) as state, p.version,u.full_name,p.create_Time from t_wf_process p,t_n_org o,t_n_user u,t_flow_process org_pro where p.creator=u.id and org_pro.process_id=p.id and org_pro.org_id=o.id [ and org_pro.org_id in (:orgIds)] [ and (p.name like '%:name%' or p.display_name like '%:name%')] [ and p.state=:state] [ and org_pro.flow_type=:type ] [ and org_pro.org_id=:orgId ] order by p.create_time

sqlUnit.name: flow_resource_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,t.uri,(select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.state and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='DATA_STATE')) as state, t.create_time from t_n_resource t where t.type='flow_resource' order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: select_flow_res
sqlUnit.sql: select distinct p.name,p.display_name from t_wf_process p

sqlUnit.name: select_flow_form
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name from t_form t where t.type='flow_form' [ and t.name like '%:name%'] order by t.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: flow_form_prop
sqlUnit.sql: select t.table_field_id,t.title from t_form_field t where t.form_id=:id

sqlUnit.name: get_userfull_flowname
sqlUnit.sql: select t.display_name from t_wf_process t where t.id=:processId union select u.full_name from t_n_user u where u.id=:userId

sqlUnit.name: process_order_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select o.process_Id,o.id, p.display_name,ffl.title,u.full_name,o.version,o.create_time, (select count(*) from t_flow_attachment fa where fa.order_id=o.id) as attcount from t_wf_order o,t_wf_process p,t_flow_form ffl,t_n_user u where o.process_Id = p.id and o.id=ffl.order_id and o.creator=u.id [ and (p.display_name like '%:name%' or ffl.title like '%:name%')] [ and o.create_time >= :startDate ][ and o.create_time <= :endDate] order by o.create_time desc

sqlUnit.name: process_hist_order_mgr_list
sqlUnit.sql: select o.process_Id,o.id, p.display_name,ffl.title,u.full_name,o.create_time,o.end_Time, (select count(*) from t_flow_attachment fa where fa.order_id=o.id) as attcount from t_wf_hist_order o,t_wf_process p,t_flow_form ffl,t_n_user u where o.process_Id = p.id and o.id=ffl.order_id and o.creator=u.id and o.id not in (select t.id from t_wf_order t) [ and (p.display_name like '%:name%' or ffl.title like '%:name%')] [ and o.create_time >= :startDate ][ and o.create_time <= :endDate] order by end_time desc

sqlUnit.name: query_flow_form_info
sqlUnit.sql: select ff.title,u.full_name from t_flow_form ff,t_n_user u where ff.user_id=u.id and ff.order_id=:orderId

sqlUnit.name: process_attachment_list
sqlUnit.sql: select pa.id,pa.attachment_id,a.file_name,a.file_size,a.file_suffix,a.create_time,u.full_name,a.user_id,pa.task_id from t_flow_attachment pa,t_n_attachment a,t_n_user u where pa.attachment_id=a.id and a.user_id = u.id [ and pa.form_id=:formId] [ and a.user_id=:userId] [ and pa.order_id=:orderId]

sqlUnit.name: get_task_actors
sqlUnit.sql: select a.display_name, group_concat(a.name separator ';') as name from ( select task.display_name, group_concat(u.full_name separator ';') as name from t_wf_task task,t_wf_task_actor actor, t_n_user u where task.order_id=:orderId and task.id = actor.task_id and u.id=actor.actor_id [ and u.org_id=:orgId ] [ and task.task_name=:taskKey ] group by task.display_name union select task.display_name, group_concat(org.name separator ';') as name from t_wf_task task,t_wf_task_actor actor, t_n_org org where task.order_id=:orderId and task.id = actor.task_id and org.id=actor.actor_id [ and org.id=:orgId] [ and task.task_name=:taskKey ] group by task.display_name union select task.display_name, group_concat(p.name separator ';') as name from t_wf_task task,t_wf_task_actor actor, t_n_position p where task.order_id=:orderId and task.id = actor.task_id and p.id=actor.actor_id [ and p.org_id=:orgId] [ and task.task_name=:taskKey ] group by task.display_name) a group by a.display_name

sqlUnit.name: get_taskmodel_order
sqlUnit.sql: select task.id,task.task_name,task.display_name from t_wf_task task where task.order_id=:orderId

sqlUnit.name: back_assigner
sqlUnit.sql: select hta.actor_id from t_wf_hist_task_actor hta where hta.task_id = ( select ht.id from t_wf_hist_task ht where ht.order_id=:orderId and ht.task_name=:taskKey order by ht.finish_time desc limit 1)

sqlUnit.name: is_take_task
sqlUnit.sql: select count(task.id) from t_wf_task task where task.id=:taskId and task.take_time is not null

sqlUnit.name: check_instance_title
sqlUnit.sql: select count(t.id) from t_flow_form t where t.form_id=:formId and t.title=:title

sqlUnit.name: select_flow_list
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.display_name from t_wf_process t where t.state=1

sqlUnit.name: get_abnormal_order_ids
sqlUnit.sql: select distinct t.order_id from t_wf_task t where t.order_id in(select id from t_wf_order o where o.process_id=:processId) and t.task_name not in(:taskNames)

sqlUnit.name: get_abnormal_order_list
sqlUnit.sql: select o.process_Id,o.id, p.display_name,ffl.title,u.full_name,o.version,o.create_time, (select count(*) from t_flow_attachment fa where fa.order_id=o.id) as attcount from t_wf_order o,t_wf_process p,t_flow_form ffl,t_n_user u where o.process_Id = p.id and o.id in(:orderIds) and o.id=ffl.order_id and o.creator=u.id [ and (p.display_name like '%:name%' or ffl.title like '%:name%')] [ and o.create_time >= :startDate ][ and o.create_time >= :endDate] order by o.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: get_hist_task_by_order_taskKey
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.display_name,t.operator from t_wf_hist_task t where t.order_id=:orderId and t.task_name=:taskKey and t.task_state=0 order by t.finish_time desc limit 0,5

sqlUnit.name: get_attachment_by_orderid
sqlUnit.sql: select a.* from t_n_attachment a,t_flow_attachment fa where a.id=fa.attachment_id and fa.order_id=:orderId

sqlUnit.name: get_attachment_by_taskkey
sqlUnit.sql: select a.* from t_n_attachment a,t_flow_attachment fa where a.id=fa.attachment_id and fa.order_id=:orderId and fa.task_key=:taskKey

sqlUnit.name: get_flow_att_infos_byid
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id as attId, fa.id as fattId,t.file_name,t.file_size,t.file_suffix,t.create_time from t_n_attachment t,t_flow_attachment fa where t.id=fa.attachment_id and t.id in(:ids)

sqlUnit.name: get_flow_displayname
sqlUnit.sql: select p.display_name from t_flow_form t,t_wf_process p where t.form_data_id=:formDataId and t.process_id=p.id

sqlUnit.name: update_flow_form_info
sqlUnit.sql: update t_flow_form set total_node_num=:totalNodeNum,execute_node_num=:executeNodeNum,progress=:progress where order_id=:orderId
